debug_mode.name: debug mode
debug_mode.desc: this is necessary for ads to be shown in a local environment

ad-error.description: Triggered when an error has occurred. This event is also triggered when no advertisement is available

adblock.description: Detect whether the user has installed an adblock tool

ad-init.description: Triggered when Poki SDK successfully initialized

show-ad.description: Commercial breaks are used to display video ads and should be triggered on natural breaks in your game.

rewardedbreak.description: Rewarded breaks allow for a user to choose to watch a rewarded video ad in exchange for a certain benefit in the game (e.g. more coins, etc.)

gameplay.description: Use gameplayStart level start and unpause. Use gameplayStop level finish, game over, pause, quit to menu
